# MergeEnvironmentForkRequest

**Properties**

| Name         | Type    | Required | Description                                            |
| :----------- | :------ | :------- | :----------------------------------------------------- |
| source       | string  | ✅       | The source environment's unique ID to merge data from. |
| deleteSource | boolean | ❌       | If true, the forked environment will be deleted.       |
